divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving to georgia one night from alabama on hwy 278 i noticed a bright light in the distance i thought no big deal its a airplane bcuz it was coming down from the sky like a airplane all of the sudden it came at me so fast i slammed on the brakes bcuz i thought this thing is fixing to land in the middle of the road then nothing black sky the thing vanished i thought maybe some red neck is spotlighting deer then i was like no way it was an object of light an not a beam that was in the late summer of 1997
Summary: i was driving to georgia at night as i was driving i noticed a light in the ditance it got bigger and seemed to be coming right at me
